item.title: ML Model Monitoring
item.description: ML Model Monitoring Mayank asked on Twitter: Some ideas/ papers/ tools on monitoring models in production. A use case would be say a classification task over large inputs and I visualise how are the predicted values or even confidence scores very over time? Quick Hacks pandas-profiling If you are checkpointing confidence scores, the quickest hack is to load them into a dataframe and visusalize with pandas-profiling: https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/
